title: ChatGPT for SEO | 5 Best Use Cases of ChatGPT for SEO | Keyword Research By ChatGPT | Edureka
excerpt: This Edureka video on 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐭𝐆𝐏𝐓 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐒𝐄𝐎 will explain how you can use ChatGPT for SEO (Search Engine Optimization). SEO is a very important for any business as it helps them to find new customers and promote their brand on top pages of search engines that make easy for users to find your brand.
